entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 2.
